source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_002790_RYNE<tab>What in the─
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_002790_RYNE<tab>Was ist d... haa!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_002800_THANCRED<tab>Urianger!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_002800_THANCRED<tab>Urianger!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_002810_URIANGER<tab>At once!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_002810_URIANGER<tab>Schon dabei!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_002820_THANCRED<tab>Down with you!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_002820_THANCRED<tab>Runter mit dir!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_002830_RANJIT<tab>Guh!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_002830_RANJIT<tab>Umpf<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_002840_RYNE<tab>Where...where is Y'shtola?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_002840_RYNE<tab>Wo ist Y'shtola?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_002850_RYNE<tab>Runar. Thank goodness.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_002850_RYNE<tab>Runar<var 1D /var>... Was für ein Glück.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_002860_THANCRED<tab>We delivered the antidote to Slitherbough, and from what we could gather on the way here, the Eulmorans have had the good manners to withdraw.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_002860_THANCRED<tab>Wir haben das Gegengift sicher nach Schlangenzweig gebracht. Die Soldaten aus Eulmore haben sich inzwischen zurückgezogen<var 1D /var>- fürs Erste haben wir also nichts zu befürchten.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_002870_THANCRED<tab>Thank the gods they did, or we would never have made it here in time. I'm told we have Runar and his comrades to thank for keeping the soldiers occupied prior to their retreat.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_002870_THANCRED<tab>Runar wurde vergiftet, als er ihnen nachjagte, um uns etwas Luft zu verschaffen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_002880_THANCRED<tab>They were preparing to come for you and Y'shtola, it seems, when Runar rallied the villagers and pursued them out of Slitherbough.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_002880_THANCRED<tab>Alle haben sich Sorgen um ihn gemacht. Aber einen Mann von seinem Mut und seiner Kraft kriegt so schnell nichts unter.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_002890_RUNAR<tab>I must...I-I must...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_002890_RUNAR<tab>Ah<var 1D /var>... Ungh<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_002900_RUNAR<tab>Where...am I?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_002900_RUNAR<tab>Wo<var 1D /var>... bin ich?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_002910_URIANGER<tab>Yx'Maja, in the care of the Viis. Thou art safe now, friend. Pray, rest thee awhile longer.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_002910_URIANGER<tab>Du befindest dich im Wald von Yx'Maja<var 1D /var>- in Sicherheit. Dein Zustand mahnt jedoch zur Ruhe.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_002920_RUNAR<tab>No...no, I am all right. Somewhat heavy of limb, perhaps, but otherwise well I assure you.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_002920_RUNAR<tab>Ach was, es geht schon. Ich bin bald wieder auf den Beinen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_002930_RUNAR<tab>I am glad to see you are all safe. When we realized where the soldiers were headed, we knew something had to be done.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_002930_RUNAR<tab>Viel wichtiger ist, dass euch nichts geschehen ist. Als ich sah, wie die Soldaten in eure Richtung marschierten, wollte ich sie um jeden Preis aufhalten.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_002940_RUNAR<tab>I...do not see Master Matoya. She was with you, yes? What happened to her?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_002940_RUNAR<tab>Aber wo ist denn Matoya? Sie war doch bei euch.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_Q5_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_Q5_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Was sagst du?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_A5_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>I cannot say for certain─but it was she who secured the antidote.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_A5_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Sie hat ihr Leben für das Gegengift gegeben.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_A5_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>She saved the Night's Blessed─albeit at a cost...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_A5_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>Die Untertanen der Nacht haben ihr ihr Leben zu verdanken.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_A5_000_003_NONE_VOICE<tab>...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_A5_000_003_NONE_VOICE<tab>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_002950_RUNAR<tab>Spare me your riddles and speak plain! Where is Master Matoya!?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_002950_RUNAR<tab>Was soll das heißen? Was ist passiert?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_002960_RUNAR<tab>Well!? Say something! Where is Master Matoya!?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_002960_RUNAR<tab>Nun sag schon! Was ist passiert?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_002970_RUNAR<tab>No...no... No, that cannot be...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_002970_RUNAR<tab>Nein<var 1D /var>... bitte nicht.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_002980_RUNAR<tab>Why would she do such a thing?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_002980_RUNAR<tab>Sagt mir, dass das nicht wahr ist. Matoya<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_002990_RUNAR<tab>Was there no other way? I...I cannot believe that she...that she...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_002990_RUNAR<tab>Eine so mächtige Magierin<var 1D /var>... verschwindet einfach so in einem Abgrund? Unsinn!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_003000_RUNAR<tab>We must begin the search immediately! I will come with you!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_003000_RUNAR<tab>Hat die Suche nach ihr schon begonnen? Ich werde euch helfen<var 1D /var>- sagt mir, wann es losgeht!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_003010_RUNAR<tab>What are you waiting for? We must find her! She could be trapped or hurt or...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_003010_RUNAR<tab>Was denn? Worauf wartet ihr denn? Wir müssen ihr helfen!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_003020_RUNAR<tab>She is alive. She is <var 1A 02 /var>alive<var 1A 01 /var>, damn you!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_003020_RUNAR<tab>Matoya kann doch nicht<var 1D /var>... <schluchz> Sie kann doch nicht einfach so<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_003030_ALMET<tab>Forgive me for interrupting, but our scouts have apprehended an intruder.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_003030_ALMET<tab>Entschuldigt die Störung, aber wir haben im Wald einen Eindringling aufgegriffen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_003040_ALMET<tab>We thought perhaps he might be an associate of yours...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_003040_ALMET<tab>Er sagt, er gehöre zu euch, also habe ich ihn mitgebracht.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_003050_THANCRED<tab>Oh, look who it is.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_003050_THANCRED<tab>Emet-Selch!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_003060_EMETSELCH<tab>Well...this is embarrassing. In my defense, they are surprisingly tenacious.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_003060_EMETSELCH<tab>Hallo, liebe Freunde. Ich muss sagen, die Jägerinnen verstehen ihr Handwerk. Sie hatten mich im Nu umstellt.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_003070_EMETSELCH<tab>So─what trouble have you gotten yourselves into this time?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_003070_EMETSELCH<tab>Was ist? Warum die Trauermienen?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_003080_EMETSELCH<tab>Well, well. What an intriguing turn of events.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_003080_EMETSELCH<tab>Welch schreckliche Tragödie. Dabei sah noch alles so viel<var 16 /var>ver<var 16 /var>sprechend aus, als ihr die Ruinen betratet.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_003090_EMETSELCH<tab>My condolences, by the way. 'Tis never easy to lose the ones we love.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_003090_EMETSELCH<tab>Mein herzliches Beileid.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_003100_EMETSELCH<tab>Well, she is dead, isn't she? Wishing it were otherwise will not make it so.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_003100_EMETSELCH<tab>Was denn? Sie ist doch tot, oder? Davon, dass man es nicht wahrhaben will, wird sie auch nicht wieder lebendig.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_003110_THANCRED<tab>That <var 1A 02 /var>you<var 1A 01 /var> should be indifferent to her loss is no surprise. But to us, she was a friend. The best of friends.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_003110_THANCRED<tab>Wir wissen, dass du nicht viel auf den Wert des Lebens gibst. Aber wenn eine Freundin, eine so weise Frau wie Y'shtola, nicht mehr ist, dann ist das keine Sache, die man leichtfertig abtut.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_003120_RYNE<tab>You have something on your mind. What is it?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_003120_RYNE<tab>Woran denkst du?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_Q6_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_Q6_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Was sagst du?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_A6_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>I'm beginning to wonder what really happened when she fell.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_A6_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Ob sie wirklich zu Tode gestürzt ist?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_A6_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>After she fell, there was a powerful gust of wind as if from nowhere...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_A6_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>Gleich nach ihrem Sturz war da ein heftiger Windstoß<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_003130_URIANGER<tab>Pray recount to us again that which thou witnessed in the ruins, omitting not the slightest detail.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_003130_URIANGER<tab>Bitte, erzähle uns genau, wie es sich zugetragen hat. Was hast du gesehen?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_003140_THANCRED<tab>Flow...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_003140_THANCRED<tab>Ein antiker Teleport<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_003150_THANCRED<tab>The teleportation magick she used to spirit us away from Ul'dah after the bloody banquet! I recall a similar gale in the tunnel before it took effect.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_003150_THANCRED<tab>Na klar. Er wirkt augenblicklich. Als Y'shtola ihn unter dem ul'dhischen Palast sprach, spürte ich auch so einen Windstoß!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_003160_EMETSELCH<tab>Interesting. I thought I sensed a brief disturbance in the Lifestream. How reassuring to know it was not my imagination.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_003160_EMETSELCH<tab>Aha, das erklärt dann auch das Zittern, das durch den Ätherstrom ging. Ich dachte schon, das hätte ich mir eingebildet.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_003170_EMETSELCH<tab>I felt it only once, I should mention. Which would suggest she is still adrift on its currents.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_003170_EMETSELCH<tab>Ja, ich habe es deutlich gespürt. Es war nur <var 1A 02 /var>eine<var 1A 01 /var> Erschütterung. Was bedeuten dürfte, dass sie in die Ätherbahn eintrat, sie aber noch nicht verlassen hat.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_003180_URIANGER<tab>Then I fear she may yet be lost to us─for it was only by the grace of the elementals that she was plucked from that great aetherial river.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_003180_URIANGER<tab>Dann stehen wir vor einer schwierigen Aufgabe. Das letzte Mal konnten wir sie mit Hilfe der Ältesten Saatseherin aus dem Ätherstrom ziehen. Doch diesmal<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_003190_EMETSELCH<tab>Oh...very well. I'll go and fetch her...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_003190_EMETSELCH<tab>Da könnte ich vielleicht helfen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_003200_EMETSELCH<tab>Perhaps a clear and unambiguous act of kindness will serve to win the trust you seem so determined to deny me.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_003200_EMETSELCH<tab>Ihr traut mir nicht? Dann lasst mich beweisen, dass ich es gut mit euch meine. Ich werde eure Freundin retten.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_003210_EMETSELCH<tab>Yes, this place should serve well enough.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_003210_EMETSELCH<tab>Ja<var 1D /var>... Hier könnte es klappen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_003220_EMETSELCH<tab>Might I have a little space? I <var 1A 02 /var>need<var 1A 01 /var> to concentrate.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_003220_EMETSELCH<tab>Wenn ich um etwas Platz bitten dürfte.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_003230_EMETSELCH<tab>Now then...what color was her soul again?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_003230_EMETSELCH<tab>Also dann<var 1D /var>... Welche Farbe hatte ihre Aura noch mal?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_003240_EMETSELCH<tab>Ah... There you are.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_003240_EMETSELCH<tab>Da<var 1D /var>... ich hab sie<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_003250_RUNAR<tab>He─He's done it! He's brought her back!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_003250_RUNAR<tab>Das ist sie! Matoya!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_003260_YSHTOLA<tab>(WAKING UP REAX)
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_003260_YSHTOLA<tab>Ah ...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_003270_THANCRED<tab>Y'shtola, are you all right?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_003270_THANCRED<tab>Den Himmeln sei Dank<var 1D /var>... Hörst du mich? Geht es dir gut?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_003280_YSHTOLA<tab>Yes... Though I cannot imagine how. What happened?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_003280_YSHTOLA<tab>Ja<var 1D /var>... Es geht schon<var 1D /var>... Was<var 1D /var>... ist passiert?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_003290_URIANGER<tab>Thou didst invoke the power of Flow, which thence did usher thy soul unto the Lifestream.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_003290_URIANGER<tab>Wir haben dich aus dem Ätherstrom zurückgeholt. Jetzt schon zum zweiten Mal.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_003300_YSHTOLA<tab>I wanted to save the antidote, and after that...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_003300_YSHTOLA<tab>Ja<var 1D /var>... jetzt erinnere ich mich<var 1D /var>... Das Gegengift<var 1D /var>... Ich musste alles auf eine Karte setzen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_003310_YSHTOLA<tab>(SUDDEN LAUGH)
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_003310_YSHTOLA<tab>He he ...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_003320_YSHTOLA<tab>I did something exceedingly reckless. For which you will just have to forgive me.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_003320_YSHTOLA<tab>Ich sollte mir langsam mal einen neuen Trick ausdenken. Der wird ein bisschen alt<var 1D /var>... Danke, dass ihr mich nicht aufgegeben habt.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_003330_YSHTOLA<tab>(SHOCK REAX)
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_003330_YSHTOLA<tab>Ah!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_003340_RUNAR<tab>Master Matoya! Oh, thank the heavens you're all right!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_003340_RUNAR<tab>Matoya! Du lebst! Du lebst wirklich!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_003350_RUNAR<tab>I had nearly given up hope.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_003350_RUNAR<tab>Ich wusste, dass es nicht wahr sein konnte! Ich bin so glücklich! So unglaublich glücklich!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_003360_YSHTOLA<tab>Please, Runar, dry your tears. What would the others think if they saw you like this?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_003360_YSHTOLA<tab>Ach Runar, wein doch nicht. Du bist doch der Stärkste von uns allen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_003370_YSHTOLA<tab>Come now─did you really think I would go gently into that dark night with so much left undone? So many mysteries left unsolved?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_003370_YSHTOLA<tab>Ich verspreche dir: Die Hexe Matoya stirbt nicht so schnell. Es gibt doch noch so viel, was ich wissen möchte.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_003380_EMETSELCH<tab>Ahem. Is there aught you wish to say to me? A word of <var 1A 02 /var>thanks<var 1A 01 /var>, perhaps?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_003380_EMETSELCH<tab>Bitte, dankt mir nicht alle auf einmal<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_003390_URIANGER<tab>Emet-Selch, the Ascian of whom I spoke. 'Twas he who plucked thee from the Lifestream.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_003390_URIANGER<tab>Das ist Emet-Selch. Er hat dich aus dem Ätherstrom gezogen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_003400_YSHTOLA<tab>I see.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_003400_YSHTOLA<tab>Gerettet von einem Ascian<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_003410_YSHTOLA<tab>Thank you. Differences notwithstanding, you saved my life, and for that I am grateful.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_003410_YSHTOLA<tab>Ich hätte nicht gedacht, dass ich das mal sagen würde, aber ich danke dir.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_003420_YSHTOLA<tab>But let us turn our attention to more important matters, such as the Qitana Ravel.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_003420_YSHTOLA<tab>Übrigens<var 1D /var>... Du warst doch nicht etwa schon in den Irrungen der Qitari?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_003430_YSHTOLA<tab>You had better not have explored its depths without me.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_003430_YSHTOLA<tab>Ich wäre untröstlich, wenn du die Ruinen ohne mich erforscht hättest.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_Q7_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_Q7_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Was sagst du?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_A7_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Heavens no. In fact, I was awaiting your return.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_A7_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Wir gehen zusammen, keine Sorge.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_A7_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>I wouldn't have known where to start.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_A7_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>Wir zählen auf dich.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_A7_000_003_NONE_VOICE<tab>I'll tell you after you've got some rest.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_A7_000_003_NONE_VOICE<tab>Aber übernimm dich nicht.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_003440_THANCRED<tab>Well. Almet and the others should be pleased to see you in such <var 1A 02 /var>uncharacteristically<var 1A 01 /var> high spirits. Let us return to Fanow, then, and discuss the coming expedition.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_003440_THANCRED<tab>Almet und ihre Schwestern werden sich freuen, dich so gutgelaunt wiederzusehen. Kehren wir nach Fanow zurück. Dann können wir über unseren nächsten Ausflug sprechen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_003450_RYNE<tab>The Lightwarden is dead. The Blessed's prayers have been answered...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_003450_RYNE<tab>Glaubst du, die Untertanen der Nacht sehen jetzt auch gerade zum Nachthimmel hoch?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_003460_THANCRED<tab>Aye, that they have.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_003460_THANCRED<tab>Ganz bestimmt.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_003470_URIANGER<tab>His condition yet troubleth thee?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_003470_URIANGER<tab>Beunruhigt dich sein Zustand noch immer?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_003480_URIANGER<tab>Her condition yet troubleth thee?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_003480_URIANGER<tab>Beunruhigt dich ihr Zustand noch immer?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_003490_YSHTOLA<tab>It does. Though <var 08 E905 ((she)) ((he)) /var> shows no immediate signs of corruption, the danger remains. <var 08 E905 ((She)) ((He)) /var> must be told.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_003490_YSHTOLA<tab>Ja<var 1D /var>... Man sieht <var 08 E905 ((ihr)) ((ihm)) /var> nichts an, aber wer weiß, wie lange noch. Wir müssen mit <var 08 E905 ((ihr)) ((ihm)) /var> sprechen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_003500_YSHTOLA<tab>...Would you describe it to me, Urianger? Paint for me a picture with your words.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_003500_YSHTOLA<tab>Sag, Urianger. Ist der Nachthimmel nicht schön?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_003510_URIANGER<tab>A sea of shimmering stars. Diamonds strewn across a raven gown, boundless and beautiful.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_003510_URIANGERUnendlich tief scheint die Dunkelheit in sternenklarer Nacht,
Doch bestückt von unermesslichem Funkeln, in weißer, schillernder Pracht.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_003520_URIANGER<tab>'Tis an exquisite sight not unlike that of the Source. Calm and gentle...and forgiving...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_003520_URIANGER<tab>Der Nachthimmel steht dem Firmament in unserer alten Welt um nichts in Schönheit nach. Schweigsam und versöhnlich ruht das Dunkle Meer des Himmels.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_003530_YSHTOLA<tab>I can see it...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_003530_YSHTOLA<tab>Ja<var 1D /var>... das Dunkle Meer des Himmels.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_003540_URIANGER<tab>For however deep the void, or wide the expanse, there is no shore so distant as to be beyond the reach of light. ...Ominous though that may sound, given our present travails.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_003540_URIANGER<tab>Welch Geheimnisse des Lebens die Sterne wohl noch hüten? Zu gerne würde ich sie einmal mit deinen Augen sehen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_003550_YSHTOLA<tab>Well fought. Let us return home.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_003550_YSHTOLA<tab>Wir können stolz auf uns sein. Wir haben viel erreicht.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_003560_YSHTOLA<tab>The murals. If I am not mistaken, they predate the empire.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_003560_YSHTOLA<tab>Die Malereien hier wurden vor der Ronka-Epoche gefertigt.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_003570_RYNE<tab>How can you tell?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_003570_RYNE<tab>Wirklich? Woran hast du das denn jetzt erkannt?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_003580_YSHTOLA<tab>A peculiarity of the paint. Most are made from mineral-based pigments, but whatever was used here is older than anything I have ever seen.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_003580_YSHTOLA<tab>An dem Farbstoff, mit dem sie gemalt sind. Die meisten Farben sind mineralischen Ursprungs und lassen sich leicht unterscheiden.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_003590_YSHTOLA<tab>According to Almet, this sanctuary was built to preserve the wisdom of the ancients. What events do these murals commemorate, I wonder?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_003590_YSHTOLA<tab>Almet sagte, dass die Irrungen der Qitari ein heiliger Ort seien, der das Wissen uralter Zeiten bewahrt. Damit meinte sie sicher auch diese Malereien.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_003600_EMETSELCH<tab>Must you always linger after defeating your enemies? Navigating these halls on foot is exhausting.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_003600_EMETSELCH<tab>Da läuft man sich die Füße wund und ihr schaut euch die Bilder an<var 1D /var>... Ich war schon ein ganzes Stück weiter.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_003610_THANCRED<tab>Come to lead us to safety, have you?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_003610_THANCRED<tab>Was willst du jetzt schon wieder?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_003620_EMETSELCH<tab>Hmph! I was <var 1A 02 /var>bored<var 1A 01 /var>. But how is the hero of the hour?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_003620_EMETSELCH<tab>Ah, der lästige Wachhund.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_003630_EMETSELCH<tab>Hmm. Fighting fit, I see. Keep up the good work.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_003630_EMETSELCH<tab>Mmh<var 1D /var>... Es ist noch zu früh. Du musst noch ein paar mehr vernichten, damit ich mir sicher sein kann.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_003640_YSHTOLA<tab>You're plotting something.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_003640_YSHTOLA<tab>Was soll das heißen?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_003650_EMETSELCH<tab>Every hour of every day. But never you mind about that. As I have told you a thousand times before: I like to watch. Nothing more.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_003650_EMETSELCH<tab>Ihr wollt aber auch alles haarklein erklärt bekommen. Ich halte nur mein Versprechen: Ich helfe und beobachte euch.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_003660_EMETSELCH<tab>Well! I would quit this place, and I suggest you do the same. There is yet work to be done.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_003660_EMETSELCH<tab>Und da ich das nun getan habe, bin ich auch schon wieder weg. Ich wünsche weiterhin gutes Gelingen!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_003670_EMETSELCH<tab>Ah...there is a sight to bring a tear to the eye.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_003670_EMETSELCH<tab>Das habe ich schon lange nicht mehr gesehen<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_003680_RYNE<tab>You recognize these scenes?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_003680_RYNE<tab>Weißt du, was hier gemalt ist?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_003690_EMETSELCH<tab>That I do. Indeed, there was a time when anyone and everyone would.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_003690_EMETSELCH<tab>Es gab eine Zeit, da wusste jeder, was hier gemalt ist.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_003700_EMETSELCH<tab>Until one calamitous day when the world was divided across ten and three reflections, sundering the land and all who dwelled upon it.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_003700_EMETSELCH<tab>Als der Planet in den Ursprung und seine Splitter zerfiel, wurde auch das Leben in vierzehn Teile gespalten. In jeder Welt wurde es zu etwas Eigenem, etwas Neuem.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_003710_EMETSELCH<tab>And the worst part? No one could remember it. Not really. Just fragments and fleeting memories of an achingly familiar world...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_003710_EMETSELCH<tab>Diejenigen, die sich an die alte Welt erinnerten, waren nicht mehr. Nur in ihren Träumen erhaschten die neuen Völker manchmal einen Blick darauf.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_003720_EMETSELCH<tab>A vision shared of a paradise lost, preserved only in song and scripture and paint...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_003720_EMETSELCH<tab>Ein gemeinsamer Traum von einer unbekannten und doch vertrauten Zeit<var 1D /var>- dieses Rätsel überforderte die Sterblichen, doch was sie sahen, hielten sie in Bildern und Liedern fest.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_003730_EMETSELCH<tab>Once upon a time. Yet here we find ourselves again. To look, learn, and <var 1A 02 /var>remember<var 1A 01 /var>...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_003730_EMETSELCH<tab>Heute sind diese Zeugnisse sehr sehr rar geworden.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_003740_YSHTOLA<tab>Then share with us the stories you know so well. We are listening.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_003740_YSHTOLA<tab>Du weißt gut Bescheid. Kannst du uns auch sagen, was auf den Bildern dargestellt ist?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_003750_EMETSELCH<tab>Before the great sundering, there was one world. A world that knew naught but peace and prosperity.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_003750_EMETSELCH<tab>Das hier ist der Planet vor der Zersplitterung: Eine großartige Zeit der Kultur und des Wachstums.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_003760_EMETSELCH<tab>Until it was faced with a crisis. Unprecedented, terrifying. Civilization found itself perched upon a precipice, staring into oblivion.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_003760_EMETSELCH<tab>Doch die Ordnung geriet aus den Fugen, und eine nie dagewesene Katastrophe brachte die blühende Zivilisation an den Rand des Untergangs.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_003770_EMETSELCH<tab>But through prayer and sacrifice, the will of the star was made manifest.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_003770_EMETSELCH<tab>Mit seinen Gebeten und Opfern erschuf das Volk eine neue Ordnung<var 1D /var>... den Willen des Planeten.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_003780_EMETSELCH<tab>Zodiark was His name, and by His grace was the calamity averted.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_003780_EMETSELCH<tab>Zodiark. Er bezwang die Naturgewalten und beendete das Leid.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_003790_YSHTOLA<tab>Zodiark!?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_003790_YSHTOLA<tab>Zodiark! Der Gott der Ascians.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_003800_EMETSELCH<tab>A savior mighty and magnificent, deserving of reverence and gratitude...one would have thought. Yet some thought otherwise.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_003800_EMETSELCH<tab>Die Welt war wieder im Lot, aber es entbrannte ein Streit über Zodiark und seine ungeheuerliche Macht.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_003810_EMETSELCH<tab>From the fears of these naysayers would rise Hydaelyn─She who was to serve as His shackles. To bind Him and hold Him in check.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_003810_EMETSELCH<tab>Diejenigen, die ihn bannen wollten, schufen zu diesem Zweck seine Unterjocherin: Hydaelyn.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_003820_EMETSELCH<tab>And so they fought, and they fought, and they fought. And in the end...Hydaelyn was victorious.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_003820_EMETSELCH<tab>Zodiark und Hydaelyn kämpften. Am Ende siegte, mit Müh und Not, Hydaelyn.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_003830_EMETSELCH<tab>With all Her strength She smote Him─dealing a blow so devastating that it split the very fabric of reality. And thus was Zodiark banished and His being divided.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_003830_EMETSELCH<tab>Unter der Wucht ihres letzten gewaltigen Schlages zerbarst die Welt. Zodiark wurde aus dem Gestirn herausgerissen und in Fesseln gelegt.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_003840_EMETSELCH<tab>That concludes today's lesson on long-forgotten history. Though I imagine your Mother would offer a rather contradictory account. As is Her wont.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_003840_EMETSELCH<tab>Das ist die vergessene Geschichte der Welt. Entscheidet selbst, ob ihr sie mir glaubt oder nicht. Hydaelyn hat euch bestimmt ihre eigene Sichtweise aufgetischt.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_003850_THANCRED<tab>I'm sorry─I can only assume I misheard, but it sounded an awful lot like you were implying both Zodiark and Hydaelyn are not gods, but─
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_003850_THANCRED<tab>Nehmen wir mal an<var 1D /var>... Nehmen wir nur mal an, du sagst die Wahrheit. Dann sind Zodiark und Hydaelyn ja<var 1D /var>...!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_003860_EMETSELCH<tab>What? Not gods of the First? Is that what you thought these paintings depicted? Or...? Oh! Ohhh...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_003860_EMETSELCH<tab>Jetzt sag bloß, das merkst du erst jetzt. Richtig, sie sind keine Götter, die dem Gestirn schon immer innewohnten.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_003870_EMETSELCH<tab>They are gods after a fashion, yes, but no different from the kind with which you are so intimately acquainted. Formed of faith and prayer, of conviction and devotion...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_003870_EMETSELCH<tab>Der Wille des Planeten wurde erschaffen. Oder anders gesagt, damit ihr es auch ganz sicher versteht<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_003880_EMETSELCH<tab>The eldest and most powerful...of primals.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_003880_EMETSELCH<tab>Sie sind die ältesten, stärksten je beschworenen Primae.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_003890_YSHTOLA<tab>You have spun quite a tale.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_003890_YSHTOLA<tab>Das<var 1D /var>... fällt mir schwer zu glauben.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_003900_YSHTOLA<tab>Yet you have not explained the role of the Ascians in all of this. How is it you are privy to ancient secrets lost to time?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_003900_YSHTOLA<tab>Woher willst du das alles überhaupt wissen?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_003901_EMETSELCH<tab>(LAUGH)
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_003901_EMETSELCH<tab>He he ...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_003910_EMETSELCH<tab>Finally, <var 1A 02 /var>finally<var 1A 01 /var>, you ask the right question! And shrewd questions warrant honest answers...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_003910_EMETSELCH<tab>Das wurde aber auch mal wieder Zeit, dass jemand eine schlaue Frage stellt.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_003920_EMETSELCH<tab>We Ascians know because it is our history. Our story.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_003920_EMETSELCH<tab>Ich weiß es, weil es meine Geschichte ist.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_003930_EMETSELCH<tab>It was we who summoned Zodiark─we natives of that sundered paradise.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_003930_EMETSELCH<tab>Die Ascians sind das Volk, das vor der Zersplitterung lebte. Wir sind die Beschwörer Zodiarks.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_003940_EMETSELCH<tab>Now do you see why we yearn for the Great Rejoining?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_003940_EMETSELCH<tab>Begreift ihr jetzt, warum wir die Splitter wieder mit dem Ursprung vereinen wollen?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_003950_EMETSELCH<tab>For our world...for our people...for all creation to be made whole again.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_003950_EMETSELCH<tab>Wir wollen unsere Welt und unsere Brüder wiederhaben<var 1D /var>- so wie sie einmal waren.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_003960_EMETSELCH<tab>Wouldn't you wish for the same?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_003960_EMETSELCH<tab>Würdet ihr das nicht auch?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_003970_RUNAR<tab>Ah, you are returned! And none the worse for wear, I see.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_003970_RUNAR<tab>Da seid ihr ja! Und alle unversehrt!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_003980_YSHTOLA<tab>You needn't worry about us. What became of the Eulmoran soldiers, more importantly?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_003980_YSHTOLA<tab>Na, was glaubst du denn? Wir haben uns eher um euch Sorgen gemacht.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_003990_RUNAR<tab>They turned tail and fled at the sight of the night sky.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_003990_RUNAR<tab>Dafür bestand kein Anlass. Als sie den Nachthimmel sahen, nahmen die Truppen aus Eulmore ihre Beine in die Hand und flohen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_004000_RUNAR<tab>The Children of the Everlasting Dark have also retreated back to Woven Oath.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_004000_RUNAR<tab>Ohne ihre Verbündeten und verschreckt vom Wunder des Himmels verkrochen sich auch die Kinder der Ewigen Dunkelheit tief in ihrer Höhle. Vielleicht wird das sanfte Leuchten der Sterne sie mit der Zeit beschwichtigen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_004010_RUNAR<tab>Try as they might, they could not deny the truth of their own eyes...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_004010_RUNAR<tab>Alle haben es gesehen. Das Dunkle Meer des Himmels. Der Ort, an den wir alle zurückkehren.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_004020_RUNAR<tab>The sunless sea of heaven, full of love and grace, where none need know pain or suffering.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_004020_RUNAR<tab>„Das Dunkle Meer umfange dich, mit sanfter Ruhe und wärmender Gnade. Es erfülle dich, mit den Gebeten derer, die liebend an dich denken.“

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_004030_RUNAR<tab>In that moment, when the sky's light began to wane, I knew our prayers had been answered.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_004030_RUNAR<tab>Unsere Gebete wurden erhört, die ganze Zeit über. Als ich das spürte, wurde ich von einem Mut erfüllt, wie ich ihn noch nicht kannte.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_004040_RUNAR<tab>...That we were doomed to face oblivion at life's end no longer.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_004040_RUNAR<tab>Es gibt mehr für uns als diese in Trümmern liegende Welt.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_004050_RUNAR<tab>When first we met, I harbored certain suspicions about you. Now I see that I was right.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_004050_RUNAR<tab>Seit ich euch das erste Mal sah, hatte ich so ein Gefühl<var 1D /var>- dass ihr etwas Besonderes seid. Jetzt weiß ich auch, warum.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_004060_RUNAR<tab>You are the Bringers of Shadow. The Warriors of Darkness. The saviors for whom we have prayed for so long.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_004060_RUNAR<tab>Ihr seid alle Krieger der Dunkelheit, nicht wahr?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_004070_YSHTOLA<tab>I suppose you're not entirely wrong...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_004070_YSHTOLA<tab>Ach, Runar. Ist das denn wirklich so wichtig?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_004080_YSHTOLA<tab>But we are not worthy of your reverence, nor have we any desire to be worshipped. If you would pray, pray for your children, that they may one day know a better world.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_004080_YSHTOLA<tab>Mit euren Gebeten preist ihr das Leben. Sie enthalten die Hoffnung und die Weisheit derer, die vor euch waren und deren Erbe ihr fortführt. Sie verbinden euch mit euch selbst. Und mit keinem anderen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_004090_RUNAR<tab>...I will do as you say. But please, let us at least hold a feast to celebrate your victory. You deserve that much.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_004090_RUNAR<tab>Ja, ich weiß. Aber lasst uns doch wenigstens ein Mal zusammen feiern. Wir werden ein Festessen abhalten und uns ausführlich über alles unterhalten!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_004100_YSHTOLA<tab>I am sorry, Runar, but there is still much to be done, and scant time in which to do it.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_004100_YSHTOLA<tab>Runar, es warten noch andere Aufgaben auf sie.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_004110_YSHTOLA<tab>We must go─all of us. For we share the same path and the same fate.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_004110_YSHTOLA<tab>Und ich werde sie begleiten. So wie es bestimmt ist für die Hexe Matoya.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_004120_RUNAR<tab>So be it. I ask only that you hold us in your hearts, as we will hold you in ours, now and ever after. By the boundless dark, this I swear.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_004120_RUNAR<tab>Ich verstehe. Aber ich werde niemals vergessen, was ihr für uns getan habt. Das schwöre ich, bei der Schönheit der Nacht.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_004130_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>So there's a light sealed inside you, is there? You wouldn't know it from the outside. You look the same as you ever did to me.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_004130_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Das Licht staut sich in deinem Körper an. Hm! Von außen sieht man es dir nicht an.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_Q8_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_Q8_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Was sagst du?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_A8_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>I must stay the course. For the others.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_A8_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Wir werden schaffen, was wir uns vorgenommen haben.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_A8_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>And what if that changes? What if it overwhelms me?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_A8_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>Was passiert wohl, wenn es zu viel wird?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_A8_000_003_NONE_VOICE<tab>Then I suppose there's naught to do but rest.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_A8_000_003_NONE_VOICE<tab>Ich bin erschöpft und brauche Schlaf.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_004140_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>True enough. Packing up and going home isn't really an option, is it. If you don't face the music here, it'll only come and find you there.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_004140_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Natürlich. Wenn du jetzt aufgibst, wäre gar nichts gewonnen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_004150_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Damned if I know. It's not as if I can lift a finger to help myself, much less you.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_004150_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Frag doch nicht so was! In meinem geisterhaften Zustand könnte ich nicht einmal Hilfe holen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_004160_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Have faith in your friends. Look out for them, and hope that they look out for you. What more can you do?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_004160_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Du hast deine Freunde, denen du vertrauen kannst. Sie wissen, wie es um dich steht und werden dir helfen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_004170_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Ah, yes. If they're not asking you to fight they're telling you to rest. Which isn't to say they're wrong. You'll need your strength for what's to come.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_004170_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Ja, höre auf deinen Körper. Nichts ist wichtiger als Schlaf und gutes Essen, das sehe ich auch so.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_004180_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>...Think he was telling the truth? Emet, I mean. All that rot about Hydaelyn being no different from any other primal...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_004180_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Übrigens. Ich habe darüber nachgedacht, was Emet-Selch sagte. Wenn es stimmt, dass Hydaelyn aus Gebeten erschaffen wurde<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_004190_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>If so, what would that make Her “blessing”? Are we just slaves to Her will?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_004190_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>... sind dann diejenigen, die mit ihrer Gabe des Lichts gesegnet sind, so etwas wie<var 1D /var>... von Hydaelyn Besessene?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_004200_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Ahh─let's pay him no mind. Lies are the Ascians' stock-in-trade.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_004200_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Ach, vergiss es<var 1D /var>... Darauf weißt du natürlich auch keine Antwort. Und es ist immer noch möglich, dass Emet-Selch sich das alles nur ausgedacht hat, um euch zu verunsichern.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_004210_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Villains, heroes─all a matter of perspective, they'd have you believe. One man's fond memory another's waking nightmare...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_004210_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Was richtig und was falsch ist, das lässt sich leicht auf den Kopf stellen. Es gibt Tage, da möchte man seine schönsten Erinnerungen am liebsten aus dem Gedächtnis löschen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_004220_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Me, I'm no saint or savior─just another sinner. And I know damn well I'm in no position to judge...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_004220_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Ich hatte schon aufgegeben. Ich war so weit, dass ich mich auf niemandes Seite mehr stellen wollte.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_004230_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>When I saw the people of Slitherbough look up at the sky and celebrate the return of the dark...felt good.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_004230_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Aber als ich die Rührung in den Augen der Leute von Schlangenzweig sah, während sie in den Nachthimmel blickten<var 1D /var>... Ich konnte nicht anders, als mich für sie zu freuen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_004240_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>It was moments like that that I cherished─much more than the thrill of adventure. The quiet after the storm.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_004240_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Ich habe die Abenteuer genossen, den Kampf um Leben und Tod, die Schätze. Aber mindestens genauso mochte ich die Anerkennung, die ich dafür erhielt.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_004250_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>I always took comfort in that.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_004250_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Wenn ich sie erhielt<var 1D /var>... Daran musste ich gerade denken.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_004260_SYSTEM_NONE_VOICE<tab>Meanwhile, in Garlemald...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_004260_SYSTEM_NONE_VOICEDie Kaiserliche Hauptstadt Garlemald
- Ursprungswelt -

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_004270_ESTINIEN<tab>What did the scouts have to report?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_004270_ESTINIEN<tab>Und? Irgendwelche Neuigkeiten?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_004280_SHADOWHUNTER<tab>Several skirmishes, but nothing of consequence. The fighting seems to have taken its toll on both sides.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_004280_SHADOWHUNTER<tab>Die Situation an der Front ist unverändert. Es gibt kleinere Scharmützel, aber weder die Allianz noch Garlemald wagen einen ernsthaften Vorstoß.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_004290_ESTINIEN<tab>A stalemate, then. The Alliance has done well to hold the line for so long.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_004290_ESTINIEN<tab>Immerhin. Trotz ihrer Unterzahl scheint sich die Allianz wacker zu schlagen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_004300_ESTINIEN<tab>...But then they did have Ishgardian reinforcements.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_004300_ESTINIEN<tab>Ist aber auch kein Wunder. Schließlich haben sie ein Heer in ihren Reihen, das einen tausendjährigen Krieg überstanden hat.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_004310_SHADOWHUNTER<tab>Nevertheless, neither side has any appetite for a prolonged engagement.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_004310_SHADOWHUNTER<tab>Mag sein. Aber ein Krieg, der sich in die Länge zieht, ist für keine Seite von Vorteil.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_004320_SHADOWHUNTER<tab>'Tis but the calm before the storm. And should the Empire choose to bring their full might to bear...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_004320_SHADOWHUNTER<tab>Der Stillstand könnte auch die Ruhe vor dem Sturm sein. Und falls das Kaiserreich auf die Idee kommt, die Sache mit einem Handschlag zu beenden<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_004330_ESTINIEN<tab>To say nothing of Black Rose.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_004330_ESTINIEN<tab>... kommt die Schwarze Rose zum Einsatz.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_004340_ESTINIEN<tab>All the more reason to hasten our search. How close are your people to identifying our next target?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_004340_ESTINIEN<tab>Die Zeit drängt. Wie weit sind wir mit den Vor<var 16 /var>bereitungen für die Infiltration?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_004350_SHADOWHUNTER<tab>Close enough. Though I have received some troubling intelligence.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_004350_SHADOWHUNTER<tab>Alles läuft nach Plan. Aber da ist noch etwas. Eine interessante Information, die uns in die Hände gefallen ist.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_004360_SHADOWHUNTER<tab>One of our generals posted to the Ala Mhigan front recently disappeared without trace from the battlefield at the Ghimlyt Dark.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_004360_SHADOWHUNTER<tab>Ein Centurio soll vom Schlachtfeld in der Ghimlyt-Finsternis verschwunden sein.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_004370_ESTINIEN<tab>Odd. Dead seems unlikely, fled less so. I wonder where he'll turn up...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_004370_ESTINIEN<tab>Geflohen, gefallen<var 1D /var>... Was soll daran so besonders sein?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_004380_SHADOWHUNTER<tab>Were I a betting man, I would say <var 1A 02 /var>here<var 1A 01 /var>─in the capital.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_004380_SHADOWHUNTER<tab>An sich nichts. Nur, dass er vor kurzem hier in der Kaiserstadt gesehen wurde.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_004390_SHADOWHUNTER<tab>Not that any deserter who valued his life would contemplate returning. But a corpse might, given the right encouragement.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_004390_SHADOWHUNTER<tab>Ein einfacher Centurio, der von der Front in die Kaiserstadt abkommandiert wird? Das scheint mir unwahrscheinlich. Ich denke, da sind andere Mächte im Spiel.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_004400_ESTINIEN<tab>In the manner of His Royal Remains, you mean?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_004400_ESTINIEN<tab>Hm, in der Tat, das kommt einem doch sehr bekannt vor.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_004410_SHADOWHUNTER<tab>Elidibus plainly has no need of a new host, so the question becomes, who?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_004410_SHADOWHUNTER<tab>Wir gehen davon aus, dass Elidibus sich Zenos' Körper übergestreift hat. Auf gleiche Weise könnte ein anderer Ascian Besitz von diesem Centurio ergriffen haben.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_004420_SHADOWHUNTER<tab>It may be that another player has joined the game.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_004420_SHADOWHUNTER<tab>Oder es wurde eine ganz neue Figur auf das Spielbrett gesetzt, die wir noch nicht kennen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_004430_SHADOWHUNTER<tab>Something to consider, at any rate. But come, there is work to be done.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_004430_SHADOWHUNTER<tab>Ich habe angeordnet, die Sache weiter im Auge zu behalten. Und wir sollten jetzt auch gehen. Komm.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_004440_ZENOS<tab>These bloodless games make for poor sport.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_004440_ZENOS<tab>Das ist ja alles wieder sehr berechenbar.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_004450_ZENOS<tab>Mayhap if Father... Nay. I am a stranger to him in this body.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_004450_ZENOS<tab>Und mein Vater erst<var 1D /var>... Ach, für diesen Körper ist er ja ein Wildfremder. Schreiben wir meinen Mangel an Gefühlen für ihn mal dieser Tatsache zu.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_004460_ZENOS<tab>Besides, there is but one hand that can make me whole again. My enemy...my friend...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_004460_ZENOS<tab>Nur <var 08 E905 ((eine)) ((einer)) /var> kann mir dabei helfen, dass ich wieder ich selbst werde<var 1D /var>... Meine liebste Beute<var 1D /var>... <var 08 E905 ((Meine treue Gefährtin)) ((Mein treuer Freund)) /var>.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_004470_ZENOS<tab>Besides, there is but one hand that can make me whole again. My enemy...my friend...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_004470_ZENOS<tab>Nur <var 08 E905 ((eine)) ((einer)) /var> kann mir dabei helfen, dass ich wieder ich selbst werde<var 1D /var>... Meine liebste Beute<var 1D /var>... <var 08 E905 ((Meine treue Gefährtin)) ((Mein treuer Freund)) /var>.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_004480_ZENOS<tab>I know not what entertainment occupies you, but if you will not clear the way for me, then I shall seize the reins of fate once more.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_004480_ZENOS<tab>Du wetzt bestimmt schon irgendwo deine Krallen. Wenn du dir einen Weg durchs Unterholz bahnst, werde ich deiner Fährte folgen<var 1D /var>- und das Schicksal bei der Gurgel packen.
